summary: Frontend UI testing for three-column layout redesign with sticky sidebars. All 14 requested features tested and verified working correctly at xl (1920px) viewport.

minor.issue: Returns 401 unauthorized - expected as user not logged in

context_for_next_testing_agent: Three-column layout redesign verified. Left sidebar (Lesson Flow), center scrollable content, right sidebar (Interactive Tools) all working. Sticky sidebars confirmed.

1_three_column_layout.notes: Three-column layout displays correctly at 1920px width with left sidebar (w-56), center content, right sidebar (w-72)

2_left_sidebar_lesson_flow.notes: Left sidebar shows 'LESSON FLOW' header with 53m total time and all 7 sections: Opening & Welcome (5min), Scripture Reading (10min), Teaching Time (10min), Interactive Activity (10min), Craft Time (8min), Discussion Questions (5min), Closing & Prayer (5min)

3_right_sidebar_interactive_tools.notes: Right sidebar shows 'INTERACTIVE TOOLS' header with 4 buttons: Scripture Lookup, Biblical Map, Quiz Generator, AI Supply List. Visible only on xl screens (1280px+) as expected

4_quiz_generator_in_right_sidebar.notes: Clicking Quiz Generator button shows quiz component in right sidebar panel with 'Get Started' button

5_biblical_map_in_right_sidebar.notes: Clicking Biblical Map button shows map component in right sidebar with 'Extract Locations from Lesson' button. API returns 401 when not logged in (expected)

6_ai_supply_list_in_right_sidebar.notes: Clicking AI Supply List button shows supplies component in right sidebar with 'Extract Supply List' button

7_scripture_lookup_drawer.notes: Scripture Lookup button opens drawer with search input, translations (KJV, WEB, BBE, OEB-US), common references, and Insert into Lesson/Copy Text/New Search buttons

8_print_button.notes: Print button found and enabled in quick actions bar

9_export_button.notes: Export button opens modal with PDF and Word format options and 'Export as PDF' button

10_add_to_calendar.notes: Add to Calendar button opens modal with Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar options, Date/Time pickers, and Create Event button

11_memory_verse_card.notes: Memory verse card displays with 'MEMORY VERSE' header, quote text '"Love your neighbor as yourself."', and clickable reference 'â€” Mark 12:31 (NIV)'. Tighter spacing applied with p-4 class

12_section_expand_collapse.notes: Section cards expand/collapse correctly when clicking header. Shows full content with formatted text, bullet points, and key points

13_mark_complete_toggle.notes: Complete button toggles section completion state. Shows checkmark and 'Done' text when completed. Progress bar updates in left sidebar

14_sticky_sidebars.notes: Both sidebars remain sticky (h-screen sticky top-0) while center content is independently scrollable. Sidebar positions stay at top:65px (below navbar) after scroll

left_sidebar.width: w-56 (224px) when expanded, w-14 when collapsed
left_sidebar.classes: hidden lg:flex flex-col bg-white border-r h-screen sticky top-0
left_sidebar.content: Lesson Flow navigation with progress bar and section list

center_content.features: Quick actions bar, memory verse, section cards, all independently scrollable

right_sidebar.classes: hidden xl:flex flex-col bg-white border-l h-screen sticky top-0
right_sidebar.content: Interactive Tools panel with Map/Quiz/Supplies components

spacing_improvements.notes: Tighter spacing throughout with reduced padding and margins compared to previous design
